commits.author: Steven Rowe
Robert Muir
commits.sourceNew:
/** * Returns this Token's starting offset, the position of the first character * corresponding to this token in the source text. *

* Note that the difference between {@link #endOffset()} and startOffset() * may not be equal to termText.length(), as the term text may have been altered by a * stemmer or some other filter. * @see #setOffset(int, int) */ public int startOffset();

commits.author: Uwe Schindler
